author: Tay Yong Kwang J:
casename: Ting Kang Chung John v Teo Hee Lai Building Construction Pte Ltd and Others
counsel: Ng Yuen (Ng & Koh) for the plaintiff; Second defendant in person; G Raman (G R Law Corporation) for the third defendant
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Discovery of documents/Application/Repeated applications for discovery/Example of litigant severely hampering the adjudication of merits of case by incessantly taking out interlocutory applications and appealing all the way each time
